name: Cossack Squat Mobility
step_by_step: Sink into deep lateral squat, shift side to side under control
coaching_cues: Sit into hips, keep chest tall

name: 90-90 Hip Rotations
step_by_step: Rotate hips side to side keeping torso upright

name: Adductor Rockbacks
step_by_step: Rock hips back from hands-and-knees position with one leg extended back

name: Lateral Lunge Hold
step_by_step: Hold bottom of lateral lunge position

name: Hip Flexor to Glute Shift
step_by_step: Shift between hip flexor stretch and glute sit-back

name: Worldâ€™s Greatest Stretch
step_by_step: Lunge forward, rotate torso toward lead leg

name: Seated Internal Hip Rotation
step_by_step: Sit upright and rotate hips internally one side at a time

name: Wide Stance Weight Shifts
step_by_step: Shift body weight side to side in wide stance

name: Quadruped Thoracic Rotation
step_by_step: Rotate upper body while keeping hips square

name: Deep Squat Hold with Shifts
step_by_step: Hold deep squat and gently shift side to side

name: Ankle Dorsiflexion Rocks
step_by_step: Rock knee forward over toes keeping heel down

name: Standing Hip CARs
step_by_step: Controlled hip circles one leg at a time

name: Spinal Flexion to Extension
step_by_step: Round then extend spine slowly

name: Lying Figure-4 Hip Stretch
step_by_step: Cross ankle over knee and gently pull in

name: Seated Box Breathing
step_by_step: Inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s

name: Hip Flexor Stretch with Exhale
step_by_step: Hold hip flexor stretch while emphasizing long exhales

name: Deep Squat Breathing Hold
step_by_step: Hold deep squat and perform slow nasal breathing

name: Elevated Quad Hip Flexor Stretch
step_by_step: Kneel with back knee down and ankle elevated behind, chest tall, gently sit into stretch

name: Half Pigeon Hip Stretch
step_by_step: From all fours, bring one knee forward into half pigeon and sit tall

name: Full Body Foam Roller Sequence
step_by_step: Roll calves, quads, adductors, glutes, upper back, lats, hamstrings in sequence
coaching_cues: Slow pressure, breathe through tight spots

name: Yoga Lizard Lunge
step_by_step: Long lunge with elbows inside lead foot, hips sink down

name: Yoga Down Dog to Pedal
step_by_step: Move between downward dog and alternating heel pedals

name: Yoga Squat Flow
step_by_step: Flow between deep squat, forward fold, and stand

name: Yoga Spinal Twist Flow
step_by_step: Gentle seated or kneeling twists alternating sides

name: Split-Stance Ankle Drive Pulses
step_by_step: Step into a split stance with front heel flat. Drive front knee forward over toes in small controlled pulses without lifting heel.
coaching_cues: Hips square, heel stays down, smooth controlled pulses

name: Skater Edge Shift Holds
step_by_step: Take a wide skating stance. Shift weight onto inside edge of one foot while keeping heel grounded, hold briefly, then shift to other side.
coaching_cues: Stay low, feel inside edge pressure, knees track over toes

name: Soleus Bent-Knee Wall Hold
step_by_step: Stand facing a wall in split stance. Bend front knee forward over toes while keeping heel flat and hold position.
coaching_cues: Heel down, knee forward, slight bend in back leg

name: Tibialis Wall Raises
step_by_step: Stand with back against wall and feet slightly forward. Lift toes toward shins, lower slowly under control.
coaching_cues: Heels stay planted, slow lower, feel front of shin working
